column1: '''''Mythlore'' 65''' is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, featuring cover illustration by [[Patrick Wynne]]. The issue reprints an article by [[Christopher Gilson]] and Patrick Wynne from [[Vinyar Tengwar 14
column2: ''Vinyar Tengwar'' 14]]: 'The Elves at Koivien√©ni: A New Quenya Sentence'.  This includes a previously unpublished [[Quenya]] sentence found in a manuscript at [[Marquette University]].<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' on Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
